title: Queenstown
content:
Friday was a rest day - everyone needed to rest their sore bodies after the first day on the snow! A few of us still got up kinda early and went in to explore the town - the weather was clear blue skies again.

We went up the gondola and looked out over the town and lake, then had heaps of fun on the luge. There was definitely some serious competition between the 4 of us that made it up to do it, which made the whole thing really enjoyable!

After some lunch, we all hung out at the house, enjoying some drinks before dinner at Fat Badgerâ€™s Pizza. Really good food, but all of us had some serious gas the next day haha!
